Bringing the Good News of Jesus to the people of Africa

Pioneering evangelism among people yet to be reached with the Gospel.

Prayer for Today

Monday 17th February 2013

Richard and Laura Morrison would appreciate prayer as they start to make plans to return to Nigeria with Caleb. Give thanks that Caleb’s passport has arrived. Please pray that his visa application all goes smoothly.

Mission Focus

Open Doors Special Education Centre

Open Doors in Jos, Nigeria provides specialised education for children with physical and learning disabilities, such as Autism, Down’s Syndrome and Cerebral Palsy.

Latest News

A Summer in Ogugu

This past year we have had five different teams to Africa and in every case their primary purpose is to share the Gospel and see people coming to a relationship with Christ.

Read more

Introducing Jahi

Following on from establishing the Donegore centre in Ogugu, Kogi State, an opportunity has arisen for ADVANCE to reach into another area in much need of support.

This project will require much support and prayer as ADVANCE seek to work with the church to establish a base and facilities in this area to help this community.

Read more

What's happening?

Below is a list of Mission Africa events this month.

21st February - Understanding Africa: Effective Mission in an African Context.A free, 3 session course exploring under the surface of the many issues surrounding mission in Africa today.
